Episode Details

Rosemary is everywhere you should be if you are interested in automating your Apple devices. Learn how Rose combines automation, apps, and development to run her content creating empire.

What is The PIT Show: Reflections and Interviews in the Tech World?

This is the show where I sit down with people in the tech space and talk about what they are doing and how they get it all done.
